Create simple HTML table

to_html_table.Rd

Turns data.frame into simple non-styled HTML table

to_html_table(x, colnames = TRUE, rownames = TRUE)

Arguments

x

two dimensional object (data.frame, matrix, array)
colnames

logical whether colnames should be displayed
rownames

logical whether rownames should be displayed

Value

shiny.tag table object

Examples

teal.modules.general:::to_html_table(iris[1:5, ], rownames = FALSE)
#> <div>
#>   <table>
#>     <thead>
#>       <tr>
#>         <th>Sepal.Length</th>
#>         <th>Sepal.Width</th>
#>         <th>Petal.Length</th>
#>         <th>Petal.Width</th>
#>         <th>Species</th>
#>       </tr>
#>     </thead>
#>     <tbody>
#>       <tr>
#>         <td>5.1</td>
#>         <td>3.5</td>
#>         <td>1.4</td>
#>         <td>0.2</td>
#>         <td>setosa</td>
#>       </tr>
#>       <tr>
#>         <td>4.9</td>
#>         <td>3</td>
#>         <td>1.4</td>
#>         <td>0.2</td>
#>         <td>setosa</td>
#>       </tr>
#>       <tr>
#>         <td>4.7</td>
#>         <td>3.2</td>
#>         <td>1.3</td>
#>         <td>0.2</td>
#>         <td>setosa</td>
#>       </tr>
#>       <tr>
#>         <td>4.6</td>
#>         <td>3.1</td>
#>         <td>1.5</td>
#>         <td>0.2</td>
#>         <td>setosa</td>
#>       </tr>
#>       <tr>
#>         <td>5</td>
#>         <td>3.6</td>
#>         <td>1.4</td>
#>         <td>0.2</td>
#>         <td>setosa</td>
#>       </tr>
#>     </tbody>
#>   </table>
#> </div>
